General.Text: ~g~Dispatch~s~: Drive to the Mirror Park in Los Santos, ~p~Detective~w~ required.

Officer.Dialogue: Go to the ~b~officer~w~ and talk to him using
~b~Officer~s~: Hello Detective! My name is ~g~Jack Walter~s~, just call me Jack. I hope traffic wasn't too bad.
~y~You~s~: Good day! No, it was okay. What do we got here?
~b~Jack~s~: We have a ~g~dead person~s~, possibly murdered, Officer Dawson ~g~over there~s~ has more info.
~b~Jack~s~: On the other side we have 3 possible suspects, one of them is the caller.
~y~You~s~: Thanks, I will talk to ~b~Officer Dawson~s~ then.

Officer2.Dialogue: ~y~You~s~: Hey, Officer Dawson! Officer Walter said you have some infos?
~b~Officer~s~: Good day Detective! You can call me Erika!
~b~Erika~s~: The victim is Lilliana Wyatt, 33 years old, had lived on Nikola Avenue nearby.
~b~Erika~s~: Yeah, we have 3 possible suspects for a potential murder.
~b~Erika~s~: One of them, Belle Hamilton, is the caller, but she also could be the potential murderer.
~b~Erika~s~: I suggest you to go to the crimescene and investigate, see if you can find something.
Go to the crime scene and search for ~b~evidence~s~.

Evidence.Text: ~y~You~s~: She has a wound to her head, she got hit with that broken bottle over there...
A mobile phone... The background shows a ~p~black Obey Tailgater~s~...
Hmmm... a half-eaten burger... not interesting.
The blood looks still fresh, it must have happened not longer than 2 hours ago...
Investigation finished! Go to the ~o~caller~w~ and talk to her using

Suspect1.Dialogue: Talk to the ~o~suspect~w~ using
~y~You~s~: Hello there! I'm the Detective in this case. What's your name?
~o~Caller~s~: Good evening, my name is Belle Hamilton. I was walking down the street when I saw her...
~y~You~s~: You did the right thing by calling us. I'm quickly checking your details.
~y~You~s~: Dispatch, can I have a person check on 'Belle Hamilton'?
Standby, I'm checking.
~b~Belle Hamilton~s~
~g~No warrants
~g~No arrests
~y~1 citation: Speeding~s~
~y~You~s~: Your record is clean. I still have some questions for you.
~y~You~s~: Do you know the victim?
~o~Ms. Hamilton~s~: No, I don't. Imagine the family members, how they must feel...
~y~You~s~: We'll take care of them. May I please see your mobile phone?
*shows mobile phone*
~o~Ms. Hamilton~s~: Here, but... aaah... there are private photos of me, I can't give it away.
~y~You~s~: You can keep it. Ah, what vehicle do you drive and what is the license plate?
~o~Ms. Hamilton~s~: I drive a Lampadati Pigalle, License Plate 86LUN445.
~y~You~s~: Dispatch, I need a vehicle check on 86LUN445.
Copy, give me a minute.
~g~Model~s~: Lampadati Pigalle
~b~Owner~s~: Belle Hamilton
~r~Expired insurance~s~
~y~You~s~: Alright, but your vehicle has expired insurance, you should renew it.
~o~Ms. Hamilton~s~: Oh, thanks. I didn't know that, I will do that.
~y~You~s~: That would be all, please wait for further instructions.
Now go to the next ~o~suspect~s~ and talk to him.
~y~You~s~: That would be all, thanks for your time.

Suspect2.Dialogue: Talk to ~o~him~s~ using
~y~You~s~: Good evening, Sir! I'm the local Detective. May I have your name, please?
~o~Suspect~s~: Hello Detective, my name is Talon Knight, born 12th December 1992. Why am I being held here?
~y~You~s~: You were in the area as this happened.
~o~Talon~s~: That's against my will! Let me go, I haven't done anything!
~y~You~s~: Once you've answered my questions, you can. Where do you live?
~o~Talon~s~: I live nearby, 2 blocks away.
~y~You~s~: And do you know the victim?
~o~Talon~s~: No?
~y~You~s~: You live near the victim and you tell me you don't know Lilliana Wyatt?
~o~Talon~s~: Ok, I know her, I just don't like her, she wasn't very friendly nor active or liked in the neighbourhood...
~o~Talon~s~: She once called the cops on me, because my dog was barking a few times, shortly after 10 pm...
~y~You~s~: Hmmm... Ok, can you show me your cellphone, please?
~o~Talon~s~: I would like to, but I dropped it last week and gave it to a repair shop. It'll cost around 100$...
~y~You~s~: Understood. What vehicle do you drive and what is the license plate?
~o~Talon~s~: I have a Vapid Minivan, my license plate is... aaaah... 47LIF... 341.
~y~You~s~: Dispatch, I need a plate check on 47LIF341.
Copy, please standby.
~g~Model~s~: Vapid Minivan
~b~Owner~s~: Talon Knight
~y~Note: Vehicle registered 4 months ago~s~
~y~You~s~: Dispatch, check the name 'Talon Knight', please.
Standby, I'm checking.
~b~Talon Knight~s~
~g~No arrests
~y~1 citation: Parking on the wrong side of the street~s~
~y~You~s~: Your record looks clean, once I'm finished, I will come back to you.
~o~Talon~s~: Alright!
Talk to the last ~o~suspect~s~.

Suspect3.Dialogue: Talk to ~o~her~s~ using
~y~You~s~: Hello Ms! I'm the detective in this case, can you give me your name, please?
~o~Suspect~s~: Hello there, my name is Nylah Lane.
~y~You~s~: Gotcha. Dispatch, can I have a name check on Nylah Lane?
Copy that, searching.
~b~Nylah Lane~s~
~g~No warrants~s~
~g~No arrests
~y~1 citation: Parking in disabled parking space~s~
~y~You~s~: Alright, sounds good. Where do you live?
~o~Nylah~s~: I live in Vinewood Hills, I have a flat there.
~y~You~s~: Wow, thats a nice place to live! Can I see your cellphone, please?
~o~Nylah~s~: Yeah sure, it's in my ... Oh, sh*t, where is it?... Maybe I left it in my car, then.
~y~You~s~: Oh, I hope so. So what car do you drive?
~o~Nylah~s~: I drive a... aaaaah... Grotti ... Stinger, yeah.
~y~You~s~: Ok, what's the license plate?
~o~Nylah~s~: ... Aaah, I don't know.
~y~You~s~: You don't know the license plate of your own vehicle?
~o~Nylah~s~: Yeah, I mean... it's complicated...
~y~You~s~: Okay, whatever. Dispatch, I need a plate check a ~b~Grotti Stinger~s~, owner is ~b~Nylah Lane~s~.
10-4, searching.
No results on this combination, let me check the owner.
I found a different vehicle on the owner:
~y~Model~s~: Obey Tailgater
~b~Owner~s~: Nylah Lane
~y~You~s~: Interesting. Ms, why did you lie about your vehicle?
~o~Nylah~s~: What do you mean? I mean.. I have 2 vehicles... or do I?
~y~You~s~: Very funny, did you lie about your phone, too?
~o~Nylah~s~: Have you found it nearby? Is that why you asking?
~y~You~s~: ... What's your relation to the victim?
~o~Nylah~s~: She's my cousin and she owes me money, a lot.
~y~You~s~: Is that why you murdered her?
~o~Nylah~s~: I only drove to her house to confront her about the debts.
~y~You~s~: Thank you for your cooperation, I'll come back to you.
Talk to ~b~Officer Erika~s~ again.

Officer3.Dialogue: Go talk to the ~b~Officer~w~ again using
~y~You~s~: Alright, I've searched the crime scene and talked to the suspects.
~b~Erika~s~: And could you find out who the murderer is?
Press {1} ~r~for Belle Hamilton~s~, {2} ~o~for Talon Knight~s~ or {3} ~y~for Nylah Lane~s~!
~y~You~s~: Ms. Hamilton didn't want to show me their phone content and said she was in the area when it happened!
~y~You~s~: Mr. Knight didn't like the victim and lives nearby!
~y~You~s~: He also couldn't show me his cellphone! He's the murderer!
~y~You~s~: Ms. Lane was around as it happened and is related to the victim!
~y~You~s~: She lied about her vehicle and her cellphone!
~y~You~s~: Her cellphone shows her vehicle. She lost it on the scene. She's the murderer!
~b~Erika~s~: Oh, I see! Go ahead and arrest the ~r~suspect~s~!

Arrest.Text: You successfully arrested the ~r~murderer~s~! ~g~Clean the scene~s~!
Oh no, you've arrested the ~y~wrong~s~ person! ~g~Clean the scene~s~!
